author: romanstumm
msg: fixed tests a better way (tests affected by different default locale)
+ marked optional module JSONGenerator with TODO (split tests)
+ marked feature JAVASCRIPT_VALIDATION_FUNCTIONS deprecated (and proposed to remove it)
+ deleted ThreadBeanValidator (believe me, it never proved to be useful...)
+ some literals in tests changed from agimatec to a more general term
+ using standard JSR303 ValidatorFactory lookup in some tests instead of proprietary lookup
